title: Flavor Pidginhole
description: A social media platform for people to connect & share their favorite recipes with other foodies.

title: HorrorScope
description: A website where you can learn about the negative traits of your zodiac sign and how your earthly career will come to an end.

title: Tech Quiz
description: This is a project where I added component & end-to-end testing using Cypress to a pre-existing quiz app.

title: Social Network API
description: A RESTful API application that allows users to create profiles, post thoughts, react to other users' thoughts.

title: Takeout Menu & Order System
description: A program that allows customers to place orders with a takeout restaurant, and receive an itemized receipt.

title: SQL Employee Tracker
description: A Super Mario themed command-line application to effieciently manage a company's employee database.

title: README Generator
description: A command line application that dynamically generates a README.md file from a user's input.

title: Study Guide
description: This is a project I made to help me laern the basics of web development prior to starting a software development bootcamp.
